items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous quality for price
items.body: This is a high quality sweater. I know it’s supposed to be oversized and ordered down a size from my regular large but it’s still way too big and sloppy looking for me. I’m debating ordering the small. For reference, I’m 5’8”, 150 #, 40” bust. Read more
items.author: Jogginggal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater. Cutely oversized, and expensive but high-quality
items.body: I got four separate compliments on the first day I wore this sweater. I'm a teacher, and even my students were noticing and complimenting! It's really stunning, and the softness is unreal. This is the thickest cashmere sweater I've ever seen, and there is a lot of material there---which is why it's so expensive! I don't necessarily think it's overpriced, now that I see how thick it is, because cashmere is such a costly material. I did not overthink the sizing, and I just ordered medium, my usual size (I'm about a 33" bust, 31" waist). It's slouchy and oversized, but in a trendy, cute way, not in a way that looks like I accidentally ordered 3 sizes too big. Personally, I would recommend just ordering your usual size if you want the same kind of look that the model has. I am glad I did not size down. Read more
items.author: purple-lilac

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars overpriced for the quality
items.body: Very overpriced. Says it's 100% Cashmere, but it feels itchy when worn and it's very very oversized. It is black and beige/gray. It's not worth the price for sure, i have cheaper sweaters that are better. I was excited for this and I am disappointed. . Read more
items.author: Zombie Lincoln

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely wacky sizing
items.body: I think the most important question people will be asking about this sweater is WHAT’S UP WITH THE SIZING?! It’s meant to be oversized, sure, but if you order your regular size it’s going to be a tent. Now, that being said, let’s discuss Amazon’s size recommendation. I’m a medium and they said I should order and XXS. That concerned me. What I recommend is to go directly to the NAADAM website. They have a size finder tool for you to input height and weight. From there they base your bust size on your age but you can adjust it if wrong. They were pretty much right on for me. So they said my size would be a small if I like a loose fit and an XS if I like a tighter fit around the bust. I ordered the XS. Honestly, I could have gone for the XXS but I was worried that the length of the sleeves or front of the sweater might not be right. I’m glad I went with the XS just because of that. So even the XS was PLENTY oversized. It definitely had lots of room around the bust. So, I’d recommend going by the brand’s recommendation personally. But I’d be interested to see how it worked out for people to take Amazon’s recommendation of 3 sizes down! The sweater itself looks nice. It’s nothing special though. I don’t know why, but I thought for this price tag it would scream quality. It’s just a sweater. It’s not particularly soft. It’s mildly itchy which is a complaint I saw on the brand’s website. It’s also not quite as cozy comfy as I expected. It’s actually on the thinner side and due to its oversized construction, a little drafty. Overall, it’s a nice sweater. Not quite sure why the price tag other than the fact that this is fairly verifiably high quality Mongolian cashmere. When I did my research it told me that this was one of the brands to look out for as a mid to high quality brand. At the end of the day, would I order it again, probably not unless it was paid for. But I do see the becoming a staple in my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: NemoMichelle

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Combo, White Combo. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
